snippet.title: Ragdolls Playground: The Sandbox Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812950/Ragdolls_Playground_The_Sandbox/
RAGDOLLS PLAYGROUND is a simple Physics Sandbox game where you can Build, Paint, Destroy, Drive cars, Simulate Wars or crush ragdolls in a large open space and watch them fight with the wobbliest physics system. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.
